item.title: REDtalks.live #49 - Imperative vs Declarative APIs /w Kin Lane
item.description: My good pal, Kin Lane, is back on the show for his third appearance to discuss the much debated topic of Imperative vs Declarative APIs. Key discussion points on this topic:
